I ordered this ring size 9 as a companion to another chevron thumb ring size 9. The other ring fits well; this one is more snug, by about a half size, or more. It is fits my thumb as snugly as my wedding ring does, which is a size 8, so I think this ring is likely a size smaller than stated. But it does fit my thumb well enough. When I wear the rings with the points toward my thumbnail, the skinny one is above the thicker one, and keeps the looser ring from sliding off, so that is a good thing. This is a thin ring, so it may bend easily. I just got it today, and the other ring yesterday, so time will tell. I did some ice-dyeing last night, so I still have blue dye around my nails. Oops.

评论概述: Size 4 (narrow and long shape) - size 3 (shirt and wide)
评论详情: I bought one in a size 4 (in the photo) and wore it halfway up my finger. I loved it! It did bend a little easy but I could bend it back and it seemed to be holding up. I loved that it had a longer point (a deeper V shape). I unfortunately lost my ring. The size 4 was out of stock so I figured I’d try a 3. The point on the 3 was so much smaller (wider and shorter). While the 3 band size fit, the ring was not nearly as pointed it was a smaller wave rather than the longer point.

It’s extremely dainty and very cute! My only issue is that it is misshapen to the point where it sits slightly weird on my finger and looks a bit uneven. It’s still wearable though!  I’ve worn it for about an hour straight so far and no green fingers yet! I’ll update my review if anything changes.
Love the look and it the size I wanted, not too thick but still sturdy. Thw only negative is it had already left a green mark after wearing it for less than a day.

Disappointed in the coloring only. Was expecting a peachy rose gold and the ring is straight yellow gold. It is still beautiful and dainty so I am keeping and appreciating it. Just want it to let others know it’s yellow 💛
Changes color fast

评论概述: Exactly what I wanted. True to picture and description.
评论详情: I chose this ring out of the other V shaped rings available because the V looked wider and deeper and over all a bit more exaggerated than the others. I intended this ring to stack with and frame a ring I already have that I feel could use a little extra something and this ring worked great for that purpose. I liked that it seemed thinner in band thickness than some others. Very dainty. I bought two in size 6 high polish silver and they are exactly as depicted and true to size. They are solid sterling silver, they will not turn your finger green. They are uniform and two of them stack against each other nicely.  Again, they are delicate and could bend easily if you're not mindful, but that isn't due to a lack of quality, just of how fine they are. They are cute on their own, too and arrived earlier than predicted. I am happy with my purchase and would have no qualms buying them again.

Ring is pretty and lightweight exactly what I was looking for. Unfortunately, I wore it for 4 hours and noticed a slight green outline of the ring on my finger. I guess I will try the clear nail polish trick...
